import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { HiUsers, HiOfficeBuilding, HiShoppingBag, HiPencil, HiTrash } from 'react-icons/hi'; const AdminDashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('users'); const users = [ { id: 1, name: "John Doe", email: "john@example.com", type: "user", orders: 15, joined: "2024-01-15" }, { id: 2, name: "Pizza Bakers", email: "pizzabakers@example.com", type: "restaurant", orders: 156, joined: "2024-01-10" }, { id: 3, name: "Jane Smith", email: "jane@example.com", type: "user", orders: 8, joined: "2024-02-20" } ]; const restaurants = [ { id: 1, name: "Pizza Bakers", orders: 156, rating: 4.5, status: "active" }, { id: 2, name: "Burger Farm", orders: 98, rating: 4.2, status: "active" }, { id: 3, name: "Chatkara", orders: 45, rating: 4.0, status: "inactive" } ]; return (

Admin Dashboard

Welcome back, {user?.name}

Total Users

1,234

+12 this week

Restaurants

48

+3 this week

Total Orders

12,456

+234 this week

{activeTab === 'users' ? (
{users.map((user) => ( ))}
ID Name Email Type Orders Joined Actions
#{user.id} {user.name} {user.email} {user.type} {user.orders} {user.joined}
) : (
{restaurants.map((restaurant) => ( ))}
ID Name Orders Rating Status Actions
#{restaurant.id} {restaurant.name} {restaurant.orders} {restaurant.rating}/5 {restaurant.status}
)}
); }; export default AdminDashboard;
